news.title: DoorDash CEO Tony Xu is taking on the role of industry consolidator in food delivery
news.summary: DoorDash CEO Tony Xu has spent 12 years building his food delivery company from an upstart into a big acquirer. Xu: "We're in the business of making people happy. We're not in it for the money"

news.title: House GOP passed trillions in tax cuts. How Trump's 'big bill' could change in the Senate
news.summary: The House GOP approved trillions in tax cuts. Here's how President Trump's "big bill" could change in the Senate. The Senate is expected to vote on the bill in the coming days.

news.title: Safer to stay home? European firms rethink travel policy over U.S. border control concerns
news.summary: "These are the sorts of things I think about when I travel to, say, China or Azerbaijan," the head of a British NGO said.

news.title: EU 'prepared to impose countermeasures' after Trump doubles steel tariffs to 50%
news.summary: President Donald Trump announced Friday that he was raising tariffs on steel imports from 25% to 50%. The move will affect all steel and aluminum imports from around the world.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts prefer these dividend stocks for consistent returns
news.summary: TipRanks' analyst ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks. Home Depot and Diamondback Energy are highlighted by Wall Street's top pros.

news.title: My life partner is 18 years my senior. He wants to leave his $4.5 million fortune to me — not his two kids. Do we tell them?
news.summary: “No doubt they would feel the arrangement is unfair, and that would potentially end our relationship,” he says. “Nooubt they would be upset,’ he adds. ‘That would potentially ending our relationship’

news.title: After 25 years, I finally asked for separate checks — and my friends iced me out. Did I do something terrible?
news.summary: “With each year I got angrier and angrier, so it was time to move on,” he said. “With every year I became more and more angry.”

news.title: ‘I am getting very frustrated’: My mother’s adviser has not returned my calls. He manages $1 million. Is this normal?
news.summary: “I am not used to this way of doing business,” he says. “I’m not a businessman. I’ve never been in this way.” “It’s a new way of life. I don’t know what to do with it.’

news.title: Trump’s playbook may be tossed, but higher tariffs are here to stay — one way or another
news.summary: Trump's trade strategy in limbo? Yes, but ‘Tariff Man’ has options. 'Tariff man' has options, but they may not be the right ones.

news.title: My friend is getting divorced. Her husband kindly said, ‘Take the house.’ Is there a catch?
news.summary: After a friend said that perhaps she’ll just settle for the house, her husband agreed and moved to file for divorce quickly. “After my friend said. perhaps she will just settle. for the home,” her husband said, “her husband agreed.”
